item.description:
This is a great event...and if you have not participated in a St Paddy day celebration and or visited the Harpoon..this is a must do. There will be special irish ales, musics and cute/crazy/weird ppl everywhere dress up in green getups all having a good time. Unfortunately I won't be able to attend this but I dont want to deprive everyone this great event. We will find a host before the week ends and everyone enjoy and bring back lots of pics and videos.

 

For more details

http://www.harpoonbrewery.com/index.cfm/page/St.-Patricks-Fest-(Boston-Brewery)/cdid/155885/pid/28549

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: St Patrick Day Festival at Harpoons
